body.name: Avenco King Mattress, 12 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress King Size, Mattress in a Box for Cool Sleep and Pressure Relief, Medium Firm Mattress with Motion Isolation, CertiPUR-US Certified
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 44 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: PRESSURE RELIEVING AND MOTION ISOLATION: Avenco king memory foam mattress can offer support and body contouring to suit your sleep position. The high-density bamboo charcoal foam used in this king size mattress helps absorb moisture, dissipate heat, and reduce motion transfer from your sleeping partner, allowing you to enjoy undisturbed deep sleep throughout the night.

COOLER SLEEP: Avenco gel memory foam mattress helps to regulate the body's temperature and minimize heat buildup during sleep. In addition, this gel infused mattress is made with a skin-friendly and breathable knitted fabric to enhance airflow. You can have a cooler and restful night’s sleep on Avenco mattress.

CertiPUR-US CERTIFIED FOR HEALTHY SLEEP: Combined with cool gel memory foam, charcoal-infused foam and high-density charcoal foam, this 12 inch king mattress provides a 3-layer foam system design that ensures excellent support and comfort. In addition, the foams used in Avenco king mattresses are CertiPUR-US and OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified, ensuring you can rest assured.

REMOVABLE COVER: This king mattresses in a box comes with a removable cover that offers a high-quality zipper in the middle for added convenience and comfort. This feature allows you to easily detach the mattress cover and clean it in the washing machine for quick and hassle-free maintenance.

WORRY-FREE PURCHASE: Avenco king bed mattress is vacuum compressed, rolled up, packed in a box, and delivered to your doorstep. It is compatible with most bed frames and foundations. To ensure the best sleeping experience, we recommend allowing at least 48-72 hours for the mattress to fully expand. If you encounter any issues or are unsatisfied with the product, please feel free to contact Avenco customer support team at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Avenco Queen Mattress has truly transformed my sleep. Its perfect blend of support and comfort ensures restful nights. The memory foam embraces pressure points, providing a refreshing start to each day. Notably, the mattress excels in motion isolation, guaranteeing undisturbed sleep. Days in, and the mattress maintains its shape, showing no signs of wear. The breathable fabric keeps things cool, enhancing overall comfort. Setup was a breeze, and the mattress quickly expanded to its full, luxurious form. In summary, the Avenco Queen Mattress is a delightful investment for those seeking comfort, durability, and a truly blissful sleep experience. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Help you have a good sleep
reviews.reviewText: It took 3 days to fully open it. The happiest thing was my son, who jumped up happily on the mattress. He loved it and helped me test the quality of the mattress. Not soft, not too hard, which is just right for me, especially for someone with a bad waist. This mattress is very friendly. When I sleep, my whole body sinks in and I feel like I am wrapped by the entire mattress, allowing me to have a good sleep. Although it is dented, it will bounce back quickly. I think the quality is very good. The only drawback is that the edge is not complete enough and not as flat as the brown mattress, but this is acceptable. After all, no product is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was actually over expectations, for a med firm. With this price shocks me. It’s not soft nor firm. I have change 2 mattress now. My old mattress was making my back hurt. But this one was a fantastic experience. The level of support it provides has greatly improved my sleep quality, and I wake up feeling refreshed. The mattress's construction is top-notch, and its durability is impressive. Overall, a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking a comfortable and supportive sleep surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable mattress
reviews.reviewText: Bit heavy to carry in the house, easy unpacking. Take about hour for the mattress fully expanded. Not too soft just want I need, help my back and neck when I am sleeping. Good mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is giving very comfortable feeling and peaceful sleep. Gives very good support to your back. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who want to keep their back straight and want to have comfortable sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have always wanted to choose a comfortable mattress, and after choosing several models, I finally decided on this mattress. I have been sleeping with my family for more than a week. We all like it very much, especially the price and cost-effectiveness, and the quality. The comfort and comfort are quite good, because sleep is very important to everyone, so it is worth recommending and sharing with everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivers firmness without sacrificing comfort
reviews.reviewText: After years of disappointment with coil mattresses from various brands, my wife and I decided to explore the realm of foam mattresses in search of the back support we desperately needed. One of our primary concerns was finding a mattress that offered firmness without sacrificing comfort. From the moment we laid down, it was evident that this mattress was different. Despite our initial skepticism, the foam construction provided an unparalleled level of support that surpassed our expectations.Additionally, we appreciate the absence of unnecessary pillow tops—a feature that tends to compromise the integrity of many mattresses. With this mattress, what you see is what you get: pure comfort and uncompromising support.We are so happy with this purchase. If you're like us, in search of a mattress that delivers firmness without sacrificing comfort, look no further than a foam mattress. It's a decision you won't regret.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is nice & firm very comfortable, one corner didn’t go up all the way it’s not noticeable other than that it’s perfect!
